summary: A standalone version of Flobulon\'s Dark Elven Thalmor-Style Equipment.  This mod adds craftable dark-colored elven equipment to all forges in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3PQ1Tfd.png[/IMG]

This is a standalone version of Flobulon\'s Dark Elven Thalmor-Style Equipment mod,
which can be found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/712]here[/url].  This version adds the Dark Elven equipment to all
forges in Skyrim in the \"Elven\" category, without replacing Skyrim\'s gold-colored
Elven armor and weapons.



[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HkV4STh.png[/IMG][/center]



[color=#FFCC33][size=4][b]Crafting:[/b][/size][/color]


In order to craft the Dark Elven equipment you need to have the \"Elven Smithing\" perk.  The recipe itself requires you to have the vanilla \"Elven\" equipment associated with the recipe and a certain amount of charcoal (stick version). You can obtain this charcoal via a recipe to turn firewood into charcoal at the smelter.  1 firewood = 2 charcoal sticks.  These sticks of charcoal should also be available [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Tools]throughout Skyrim[/url] (you can see them in dungeons occasionally), and are purchasable from some vendors.



[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HkV4STh.png[/IMG][/center]



[color=#FFCC33][size=4][b]Conflicts:[/b][/size][/color]


The only mods I can imagine conflicting with this mod are ones which modify Thalmor Leveled lists if you\'re using the Thalmor version.  However, I\'m not aware of any mod which does this.

You do not need to download Flobulon\'s Dark Elven Thalmor-Style Equipment to use this mod.

If you\'re using Melt-Down Everything you might want the recipe to require the charcoal you can get from the smelter to make your Dark Elven equipment.  I\'m willing to make a version of this mod for you which does this if you request it.




[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HkV4STh.png[/IMG][/center]



[color=#FFCC33][size=4][b]Dark Elven Thalmor:[/b][/size][/color]


The current file makes it so the Thalmor spawn with Dark Elven equipment.  This file renames the \"Elven Light\" armor pieces to \"Thalmor\" armor pieces, changes the textures for the \"Elven Light\" armor, and modifies some leveled item lists.

[b][i]If you don\'t want this you should download the optional file \"Dark Elven - no thalmor\".[/b][/i]



[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HkV4STh.png[/IMG][/center]



[color=#FFCC33][size=4][b]Future Plans:[/b][/size][/color]


-Chunk charcoal version for MDE users



[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HkV4STh.png[/IMG][/center]



[color=#FFCC33][size=4][b]Permissions:[/b][/size][/color]


I was given permission to upload this standalone version of Flobulon\'s mod by Flobulon.  You cannot use the textures from this mod without Flobulon\'s express permission.
author: matortheeternal
